content: In alchemy, what mythical substance was believed to cure all diseases and grant eternal life, in addition to turning base metals into gold?

Ah, you're delving into the fascinating world of alchemy! The mythical substance you're referring to is called the "Philosopher's Stone." It was believed to possess remarkable properties, including the ability to transmute base metals into precious ones like gold, as well as to create an elixir of life that could cure illnesses and bestow immortality. The pursuit of the Philosopher's Stone was a central goal in alchemical research across various cultures and epochs.
